text: ai eemaanadaaron (tum kisee qaum ka) koee mard ( doosaree qaum ke mardon kee hansee na udaaye mumakin hai ki vah log (khuda ke nazadeek) unase achchhe hon aur na aurate auraton se (tamasakhur karen) kya ajab hai ki vah unase achchhee hon aur tum aapas mein ek doosare ko milane na do na ek doosare ka bura naam dharo eemaan laane ke baad badakaaree (ka) naam hee bura hai aur jo log baaz na aaen to aise hee log zaalim hain
